desc: This course is an introduction to speaking, reading and writing Japanese; writing includes the learning of all syllabic letters (Hiragana and Katakana) and basic Kanji (Chinese characters). Class meets four times weekly. Individual language laboratory visits are also required.
name: Beginning Japanese I
notes: Students In Japanese 111 must also register for one lab Japanese 111AL, BL or CL and one discussion Japanese 111AD, BD, or CD.
title: Beginning Japenese I
